title: Tips for Silver 1
body:
Hi Everyone,

I recently hit Silver 1 and this is the 4th time I've been in Silver 1, I keep getting demoted back to Silver 2 then get promoted back to Silver 1 this is the 4th time. So if it's possible can someone give me some tips to improve my gameplay or some strategies that would help me get to Gold V thats would be great. Thanks

replies.body: Play to win the game not to win your lane
But I need to win my lane so I can carry, If I do average in my lane all the other lanes go like 2/7 2/5 1/3 etc

But the question is, once you've won lane (which is done by 10 minutes in) why are you allowing your team to keep falling behind?

If your 2/3 kills up in the first 10 minutes, snowball the game, don't just sit in lane twiddling your thumbs and hope that your team do the work for you.

Feel free to add me im currently gold three but I dont play at all pretty much but I will help you if you need some!
VTXRango (League and skype)
Have a good day!
